Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Puts hands together, slight bow a la Jack Sparrow::: 

Much appreciated. I'm in 50 lists, over half of those are RPGs... so... makes 
it difficult for me to... check 100+ emails a day when I don't have much time 
as it is. I prefer to have a life than just online. Thank you. :) 

My other issue... I've mentioned this to Airly... about in the subject 
heading.. putting the title of the "scene" then in (( ))  put the character that is 
posting followed by an ATTN then the characters that are to read & respond to 
a certain post.
I've learned this from a couple other RPGs in which has made RPGing MUCH 
easier... defered from wrong posting, blitz posted, etc. Keeping the story at a 
steady enough pace & a VERY good storyline too. 
Maybe we can adopt this? Would be SOOOO much easier especially on someone who 
doesn't particularly want to read TONS of email that does not pertain to them 
since reading something I really don't need to know can confuse. 


Much appreciated, :: again bows a la Jack Sparrow:: 
Stac
~Maxima  

--part1_89.244e8ea.2d4bc78a_boundary
